name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Skilled in **HTML/CSS**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Vue 2/3**, I possess extensive experience as a Full Stack Developer with 8 years in crafting high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My proficiency encompasses frontend technologies like **SSR**, **SSG**, and **Nuxt**, supported by a solid background in **Git**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** for seamless development and deployment. I specialize in creating intuitive user interfaces, ensuring robust functionality through **unit tests** and leveraging **microfrontends** for scalable projects. 

Focused on teamwork and self-organization, I've successfully led enterprise-grade platform developments, integrating **CI/CD** practices using **GitLab CI** and **GitHub Actions**. My tech stack also includes **websockets**, **Fetch API**, and **PWA** capabilities backed by service workers, delivering real-time data experiences. I am committed to following design patterns to enhance maintainability while ensuring compliance with industry standards. My background in **FastAPI**, **Django**, and cloud platforms **Azure** and **AWS** further strengthens my development acumen, enriching collaborative workflows in diverse environments.
